<h1 class="firstHeading" id="firstHeading" lang="en">List of English football transfers summer 2016</h1>
<div class="mw-body-content" id="bodyContent">
<div id="siteSub">From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia</div>
<div id="contentSub"></div>
<div class="mw-jump" id="jump-to-nav">
					Jump to:					<a href="#mw-head">navigation</a>, 					<a href="#p-search">search</a>
</div>
<div class="mw-content-ltr" dir="ltr" id="mw-content-text" lang="en"><script>function mfTempOpenSection(id){var block=document.getElementById("mf-section-"+id);block.className+=" open-block";block.previousSibling.className+=" open-block";}</script><p>This is a list of English football transfers for the <i>2016 summer transfer window</i>. Only moves featuring at least one <a href="/wiki/Premier_League" title="Premier League">Premier League</a> or <a href="/wiki/EFL_Championship" title="EFL Championship">Championship</a> club are listed.</p>
<p>The summer transfer window began once clubs had concluded their final domestic fixture of the <a href="/wiki/2015%E2%80%9316_Premier_League" title="2015–16 Premier League">2015–16</a> season, but many transfers will only officially go through on 1 July because the majority of player contracts finish on 30 June. The window will remain open until 18:00 BST on 1 September 2016. The window shuts at 18:00 BST this time due to the UEFA player registration deadlines for both the Champions League and Europa League ending at 23:00 BST, giving the 6 sides still in Europe time to conclude deals and register their player for continental matches if appropriate.</p>
<p>This list also includes transfers featuring at least one <a href="/wiki/Premier_League" title="Premier League">Premier League</a> or <a href="/wiki/EFL_Championship" title="EFL Championship">Championship</a> club which were completed after the end of the <a href="/wiki/List_of_English_football_transfers_winter_2015%E2%80%9316" title="List of English football transfers winter 2015–16">winter 2015–16 transfer window</a> and before the end of the 2016 summer window.</p>
<p>Players <a href="/wiki/Free_agent" title="Free agent">without a club</a> may join at any time, and clubs below <a href="/wiki/Premier_League" title="Premier League">Premier League</a> level may sign players <a href="/wiki/Loan_(sports)" title="Loan (sports)">on loan</a> during loan windows. Clubs may be permitted to sign a <a href="/wiki/Goalkeeper_(association_football)" title="Goalkeeper (association football)">goalkeeper</a> on an emergency loan if they have no registered goalkeeper available.</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Transfers">Transfers</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_English_football_transfers_summer_2016&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1" title="Edit section: Transfers">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>All clubs without a flag are English. Note that while <a href="/wiki/Cardiff_City_F.C." title="Cardiff City F.C.">Cardiff City</a> and <a href="/wiki/Swansea_City_A.F.C." title="Swansea City A.F.C.">Swansea City</a> are affiliated with the <a href="/wiki/Football_Association_of_Wales" title="Football Association of Wales">Football Association of Wales</a> and thus take the Welsh flag, they play in the <a href="/wiki/English_football_league_system" title="English football league system">English football league system</a>, and so their transfers are included here.</p>
<table class="wikitable sortable" style="width:78%; text-align:center; text-align:left;">
<tr>
<th>Date</th>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Moving from</th>
<th>Moving to</th>
<th>Fee</th>
</tr>

<span class="citation wikicite" id="endnote_reference_name_F"><sup>b</sup></span> Player officially joined his club on 1 July 2016.<br/>
<span class="citation wikicite" id="endnote_reference_name_F"><sup>c</sup></span> Player officially joined his club on 4 July 2016.<br/>
<span class="citation wikicite" id="endnote_reference_name_F"><sup>d</sup></span> Part of a combined deal worth £5.5m.<br/></p>

<th class="navbox-group" scope="row">Cup competitions</th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px">

<table class="nowraplinks navbox-subgroup" style="border-spacing:0">
<tr>
<th class="navbox-group" scope="row">FA cups</th>
<td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px">
<div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul>
<li><a href="/wiki/2016%E2%80%9317_FA_Cup" title="2016–17 FA Cup">FA Cup</a> <small>(<a href="/wiki/2016%E2%80%9317_FA_Cup_qualifying_rounds" title="2016–17 FA Cup qualifying rounds">Qualifying rounds</a>, <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=2017_FA_Cup_Final&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="2017 FA Cup Final (page does not exist)">Final</a>)</small></li>
